channel.title: [wip] highscores template :: feedback and/or suggestions [LIVE DEMO]
channel.description:
[size=24pt]live preview: http://bootstraphs.net46.net/[/size]
made this last night with bootstrap [img]http://i.imgur.com/tmlel83.png[/img]
edit: version 2 [img]http://i.imgur.com/YlLsdmJ.png[/img]
currently there is some mysql functionality but not much uses mysqli not mysql_ functions pulls usernames/stats from database, currently orders them by id (rank column) $_get params for ?id, ?user, and ?p (?id=19 :: slayer, ?user=Vain :: Vain's personal page, and ?p=3 :: page 3)
pagination works perfectly so far, by every 20 results (limited to 5 for the picture) [|<<] first page (0) [<<] page - 1 (given page > 0) [PAGE_NUMBER] [>>] page + 1 (given page < total pages) [>>|] last page ([b]saw how retarded i was with newbiehacker's pointing out[/b])

item.title: [wip] highscores template :: feedback and/or suggestions [LIVE DEMO]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:11, topic:528898”]There’s something wrong with the site
http://i.imgur.com/raliNSh.png[/quote]yeah half the things don’t work on the love preview and the span amounts were messing up on me.

Read full topic

item.title: [wip] highscores template :: feedback and/or suggestions [LIVE DEMO]
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:5, topic:528898”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=647653.msg4356133#msg4356133 date=1377623321]
Looks nice, however, the color of the usernames doesn’t clash very good with the blue background.

[/quote]changed the links to the same color as the rest of the font, #333

[hr]

ported the whole template to ajax to use 1 page for the theme, then load page contents for the ‘home’, 'account, and ‘highscores’ links.

ajax is loading everything fine even pagination

[hr]
got everything loaded/sorted out except ranking, not sure how to do it yet.
all the pages load skill data/print the experience via ajax etc.

pagination works, skill list works, urls at top work - whole deal. working on ranking./ordering.
currently lists results by player’s id in the database, which conflicts with the ordering of xp being different colors, not the correct offset

live demo: http://bootstraphs.net46.net/
the mysqli queries/ajax seems to be very laggy on 000webhost, compared to that on wampserver.
[size=14pt]personal scores wont work due to the php version on 000webhost not working
pagination seems to break on live site as well[/size]
hopefully someone can help me with the ‘ranking’ portion, and then someone with mysqli knowledge can look over the code before releasing.[/quote]

It’s looking nice, good job. What are you planning to do with this when you’re done? Release it? Use for your own server?

Read full topic
item.source: [wip] highscores template :: feedback and/or suggestions [LIVE DEMO]

item.title: [wip] highscores template :: feedback and/or suggestions [LIVE DEMO]

item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:7, topic:528898”]I won’t be active for a good week or so, sorry for not replying to the PMs, I’ll try help when I’m back if you need it.[/quote]its all fine and dandy. im in no rush to finish this, just looking to accomplish it so i can say i did it and for the learning of it.

Read full topic

item.title: [wip] highscores template :: feedback and/or suggestions [LIVE DEMO]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:4, topic:528898”]Looks nice, however, the color of the usernames doesn’t clash very good with the blue background.[/quote]changed the links to the same color as the rest of the font, #333

[hr]

ported the whole template to ajax to use 1 page for the theme, then load page contents for the ‘home’, 'account, and ‘highscores’ links.

ajax is loading everything fine even pagination

[hr]
got everything loaded/sorted out except ranking, not sure how to do it yet.
all the pages load skill data/print the experience via ajax etc.

pagination works, skill list works, urls at top work - whole deal. working on ranking./ordering.
currently lists results by player’s id in the database, which conflicts with the ordering of xp being different colors, not the correct offset

live demo: http://bootstraphs.net46.net/
the mysqli queries/ajax seems to be very laggy on 000webhost, compared to that on wampserver.
[size=14pt]personal scores wont work due to the php version on 000webhost not working
pagination seems to break on live site as well[/size]
hopefully someone can help me with the ‘ranking’ portion, and then someone with mysqli knowledge can look over the code before releasing.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[size=24pt]live preview: http://bootstraphs.net46.net/[/size]

made this last night with bootstrap

edit: version 2

currently there is some mysql functionality but not much
uses mysqli not mysql_ functions
pulls usernames/stats from database, currently orders them by id (rank column)
$_get params for ?id, ?user, and ?p (?id=19 :: slayer, ?user=Vain :: Vain’s personal page, and ?p=3 :: page 3)

pagination works perfectly so far, by every 20 results (limited to 5 for the picture)
[|<<] first page (0)
[<<] page - 1 (given page > 0)
[PAGE_NUMBER]
[>>] page + 1 (given page < total pages)
[>>|] last page (saw how retarded i was with newbiehacker’s pointing out)
